class.name: world.classes.Object
class.description: Represents anything that is not a: - Agent - Crowd - Urban block - Area - Position - Planned work

method.name: useToGetDecontaminated
method.description:
To decontaminate me through this element.
Returns 'true' once decontamination is complete, 'false' otherwise.

method.name: canBeUsedToGetDecontaminated
method.description: Returns 'true' if this entity can be used by the agent to get decontaminated.

method.name: isDamaged
method.description: Returns 'true' if this element is damaged, 'false' otherwise.

method.name: damageIt
method.description: To damage this element. Returns 'true' upon action completion (once the quantity of damage has been applied on the element).

argument.name: quantityOfDamage
argument.description: The quantity of damage to use to damage the installation.

method.name: canBeDamaged
method.description:
Return 'true' if this element can be damaged by the crowd agent, 'false' otherwise.
This implemenation returns 'true' if the crowd agent has entirely reached this element.

method.name: reachIt
method.description: For the agent to enact the decision to move towards this object, along some path. Returns true once the agent has reached the end-point of the path (please note that this end-point may be distinct from the target position to reach).

argument.name: pathType
argument.description: The path type used by the agent to reach the given destination.
